Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Orleans Pelicans ended their 11-game losing streak on Friday with a 132-120 win over Washington behind CJ McCollum's career 50-point performance.
Others: Dejounte Murray played 28 minutes on Friday, scoring 11 points and dishing 12 assists.
Washington lists Saddiq Bey (knee) and Marvin Bagley III (knee) out for Sunday, and guard Jordan Poole is listed as out with a left hip contusion.
